name: spotify-lambda
description: access spotify api with lamda function

scripts.dotenv: touch .env && echo 'ARCHIVED_PL=' >> .env && echo 'CLIENT_ID=' >> .env && echo 'CLIENT_SECRET=' >> .env && echo 'CURRENT_PL=' >> .env && echo 'REFRESH_TOKEN=' >> .env && echo 'DAYS_TO_EXPIRE=' >> .env

author: Gray Yeargin
